name: Manasu's Journey
description: Blurry. You emerge in a familiar, yet foreign world. You must discover who you are in this giant world. Manasu's Journey is a short story platformer where your only goal: discover who you are. Traverse mountainous landscapes with mythical architecture whilst taking a small and simple story. Made with everyone in mind, Manasu's Journey is a simple story and only takes a moment of your time to play.
